flawed_nl_solution:
This year, Kyle was only able to pick 12/2 = <<12/2=6>>6 roses.
He wants to give his mother 12 x 2 = <<12*2=42>>42 roses.
He still needs another 42 - 6 = <<42-6=36>>36 roses.
He would have to spend 36 x 3 = $<<36*3=108>>108.
#### 108

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 42. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
